function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Simulating COVID-19 epidemic with SEIR agent-based model","Impact":"Inaccurate simulation could lead to misleading results and ineffective intervention strategies.","Mitigation":"Validation of model with real-world data and verification with existing epidemiological models.","Technologies":"Agent-based modeling software, validation algorithms, epidemiological models","People":"Epidemiologists, public health officials, policymakers","Owner":"Epidemiological research institutions, public health agencies"},{"Description":"Assessment of economic effects of different social-distancing scenarios","Impact":"Incorrect assessment may lead to ineffective policy decisions and economic consequences.","Mitigation":"Incorporation of real-time economic data, validation of economic models, and consideration of long-term effects.","Technologies":"Economic modeling software, real-time economic data collection tools","People":"Economists, policymakers, government officials","Owner":"Economic research institutions, government agencies"},{"Description":"Dependence on government enforcement of social isolation measures","Impact":"Ineffective enforcement may lead to failure of social distancing interventions and exacerbation of the epidemic.","Mitigation":"Development of comprehensive enforcement strategies, public education on the importance of compliance, and oversight mechanisms.","Technologies":"Communication tools, enforcement technologies, public education campaigns","People":"Government authorities, law enforcement, public health officials","Owner":"Government agencies, public health agencies"}]}
